name: Craft2Mine
description:
Craft 2 mine has been created in 2 week during 'Jamcraft 2' by Federico Rossi (Artist) and Yuri Lucarelli (Programmer and Composer).
All assets have been created during the jam.

You a robot core, your objective is to simply recapture an old minerals' quarry.

The idea is simple, gather minerals, process it and progess through the mine.

The core has 3 menu: Constructions, Minerals and Upgrades.
You have to select an option and then position it into the map.
Upgrades will become effectives as soon as they are built, but remember to click on the map to confirm once you pick up an option from the crafting menu!

In order to get purified materials you have to choose the second slot, select the material you want and click on the tile you want to create the stock. You can only select a tile near the central hub where's located the "drop zone".

You have 2 type of robots, contructors and deconstructors.

Further informations are presents in the tutorial in game.

Commands:
wasd               - move the camera
tab                   - open core's menu
escape           - you can guess
mouse           - come on, you know what the mouse does!
